name: The Miskatonic River Smugglers
public_facade: None. They operate in the shadows of Rivertown and the city docks.
true_purpose: A loose coalition of independent bootleggers and criminals who use the Miskatonic River to smuggle liquor from Canada and 'other goods' from the port of Innsmouth.
leader: No single leader. Several 'captains' run their own crews, with Finn O'Donnell being one of the most reliable.
headquarters: No fixed HQ. They meet at Hibb's Roadhouse or in the back rooms of Rivertown pubs.
symbols: None, but many of the sailors have crude kraken or fish-like tattoos.
rumors: They're the only ones brave or foolish enough to sail to Innsmouth after dark. Some of their boats come back... different.
